channel.title: seanreiser tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from seanreiser.

item.description: @jnettik It was a good talk. I have ppl around me that have health issues so I'm still not in a position to attend camps / cons yet. Since I can't be in a room with 100's of my DrupalFam, I'm going through sessions I couldn't attend in the past for professional growth.
@jnettik Just a quick thank you. I watched your session about #Drupal's Cacheing API from Drupaldelphia the other day over lunch.
